short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the QR code of the current tab's url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast convert a tab's URL to a QR code, scan it with your mobile and continue browsing on the go!

With URL2QR you will never have to type a URL to your phone again. Just click and scan!
